itemDescription: Irish sailor and recipient of the Victoria Cross

wikipedia_page.main: John Sullivan  (10 April 1830 – 28 June 1884) was a sailor in the Royal Navy and an Irish recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: John Sullivan may refer to:
